bike.description: P. Series Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo, double-butted TT/DT, SS-specific dirt/park/street geo, integrated externally relieved HT, forged horizontal drop outs w/ disc mount and integrated tensioner

components.description: Taper Cr-Mo blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 5mm dropouts for 3/8" axle
Integrated FSA Impact, 1-1/8" threadless, Campy type cartridge bearings
SBC Aggro Stem, 3D forged/CNC, 4-bolt, 35mm length
Butted 31.8mm alloy riserbar, 60mm rise, 8 degree back sweep, 6 degree up
P. Grip, flanged soft compound, closed end, 150mm
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 140mm G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid FR-5, alloy, two-finger, linear pull
Single speed, Cr-Mo, 1/2" x 1/8" x 12t
KMC Z510HX, 1/2" x 1/8", anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular Cr-Mo for 8 spline, 175mm length
CNC cut 6061, 25t, Motostar design
Mid BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm 8 spline hollow Cr-Mo BB spindle, alloy tube and cone spacers
SBC Lo Pro plastic platform, loose ball, 9/16"
P. Disc 26", alloy double wall, pinned w/ eyelets, 36h
P. Low flange, forged alloy, 3/8" bolt on axle, cartridge bearings, 36h
P. Disc Cassette, Forged alloy single speed cassette, machined flanges and disc mount, 3/8" bolt on axle, ground race, 36h
2mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 26 x 2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead
Specialized Rhythm Lite Control, 26 x 2.3", 60TPI, aramid bead
Schraeder valve
P. Combo, 1pc co-molded composite saddle and alloy seat post combination
Alloy, no offset, 25.4mm
Integrated w/ replaceable single bolt
Reflectors, owners manual
